name: the rain is coming!!!
description:
protect the lil bean guy against the rain! good luck! :)

this is my first entry in the Firepit game-a-week project!
this week's theme was "10 seconds or less"

link to jam page: itch.io/jam/firepit-gaw1

(if i can work out how to get godot to export to HTML properly then i'll do that but until then i'm sorry) i did it! thanks, ash.

README:
"thank you for downloading playing "The rain is coming", a game by zachariah "dogs" chandler, created for week 1 of the Firepit game-a-week project [ https://itch.io/jam/firepit-gaw1 ], this week's theme was "10 seconds or less"

all images and sounds used for this game are in the public domain or i stole them, lole. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

how to play: the game will teach you -- all you need is a mouse (it's wayyyyy harder on trackpad, jsyk)."
